patthana14.27:4.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.27:4.2: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.27:4.3: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.27:5.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana14.27:6.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana14.27:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
